name: Space escape (Parquesun)
description:
THE GAME

It's a plataformer where there is monster haunting you.

OBJECTIVE

make some sick parkour to get 3 cards and use them to kill the monster.

STORY

Belive me there is a good history that I haven't implemented in the game. So why don't you say the history here? Good question

________________________________________________________

Controls

WASD = to walk

S = to do a leap forward

SPACE = to jump
